actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949, as amended by the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973, to provide for the adjustment of the so-called target prices for wheat, feed grains and cotton on the basis of the farmers' increased cost of producing such commodities.

summary.text: Provides for the adjustment of the so-called target prices for wheat, feed grains, and cotton, on the basis of the farmers' increased cost of producing such commodities rather than on the index of prices paid by farmers for production items, interest, taxes, and wage rates.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949, as amended by the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973, to provide for the adjustment of the so-called target prices for wheat, feed grains and cotton on the basis of the farmers' increased cost of producing such commodities.
